sentence.Network_cn: 他亲口承认自己在佛罗里达从事房地产投机生意时逃过税。

Sentence.sentence: The traits that characterise him are very contradictory to the racial stereotypes that black people are aggressive and uneducated," says Ashby Plant of Florida State University.

sentences.en: He flew his private plane to Florida.
sentences.cn: 他驾着他的私人飞机飞往佛罗里达州。

sentences.en: I spent my childhood and adolescence in Florida.
sentences.cn: 我在佛罗里达度过了童年和少年时期。

sentences.en: Our reporters will keep you up to the minute with the latest developments in Florida.
sentences.cn: 我们的记者会随时为您报道佛罗里达州的最新消息。

sentences.en: Father’s letter was mailed from Florida last week and came to hand today.
sentences.cn: 父亲上周从佛罗里达寄的信今天才收到。

sentences.en: For someone who doesn’t like heat, Florida would be hell on earth.
sentences.cn: 对不喜欢热天的人来说，佛罗里达简直就是人间地狱。
